General.Name: Park Lawn Corp
General.Description: Park Lawn Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, owns and operates cemeteries, crematoriums, and funeral homes in Canada and the United States. The company primarily offers cemetery lots, crypts, niches, monuments, caskets, urns, and other merchandise, as well as funeral, after life celebration, cemetery, and cremation services. The company was founded in 1892 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 2 St. Clair Avenue West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4T 2T5
